db:abstract.db:para: This type was introduced in QtWebEngine 1.1.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: Stores the state of a download to be used to manage requested downloads.
By default, the download is rejected unless the user explicitly accepts it with WebEngineDownloadItem::accept().

db:section.db:title: [read-only, since QtWebEngine 1.2] mimeType : string
db:section.db:para: Holds the MIME type of the download.
This property was introduced in QtWebEngine 1.2.

db:section.db:title: path : string
db:section.db:para: Holds the full target path where data is being downloaded to.
The path includes the file name. The default suggested path is the standard download location and file name is deduced not to overwrite already existing files.
The download path can only be set in the WebEngineProfile.onDownloadRequested handler before the download is accepted.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] receivedBytes : int
db:section.db:para: Holds the amount of data in bytes that has been downloaded so far.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] state : enumeration
db:section.db:para: Describes the state of the download:

db:td.db:para: Download has been requested, but it has not been accepted yet.
Download has been interrupted (by the server or because of lost connectivity).

db:section.db:title: [read-only] totalBytes : int
db:section.db:para: Holds the total amount of data to download in bytes.
-1 means the total size is unknown.

db:section.db:title: void accept()
db:section.db:para: Accepts the download request, which will start the download.
